article_title: Insurance plans, brain research, UTMB complaints
article_text:
Insurance plans, brain research, UTMB complaints The week's developments in the Texas Medical Center and beyond

Photo: Elizabeth Conley, Staff Mark and Dianne Duncan were healthy when they signed up for a Blue...

This week's big story is that Texas' largest insurance carrier removed all of its preferred provider organization plans from the Affordable Care Act's federal exchange in Houston and the private individual market. This affects tens of thousands of people.

og.description:
This week's big story is that Texas' largest insurance carrier removed all of its preferred provider organization plans from the Affordable Care Act's federal exchange in Houston and the private individual market. This affects tens of thousands of people. 
 Days later, Humana Insurance Co. announced a new PPO that will be offered through a subsidiary. 
 For updates on the ACA, go to HoustonChronicle.com/ACA. 
 Here are more highlights of medical developments in the Houston area this week.

This affects tens of thousands of people.
